===Noun===
{{zh-noun}}

# {{lb|zh|musical instrument}} [[horn]]
# {{lb|zh|musical instrument}} {{zh-alt-name|嗩吶|[[suona]]}}

====Usage notes====
This is a generic term which can be used to describe anything that has a horn or trumpet-like [[conical]] shape.
